input.sentences: we went to visit the dam for our trip .
the structure itself was very big .
it was interesting to see the purposes of the dam and it 's function .
there were a lot of other visitors there as well .
we had a really great time visiting the dam .
output.sentences: The dam was one hundred times older than I was.
The structure was hard as a rock.
It served many purposes like holding water.
Many visitors would come near and far.
Just to catch a glimpse of the dam.
